summary: "Return of the Jedi," released in 1983, is the third movie in the original Star Wars trilogy. It follows Luke Skywalker and the Rebel Alliance as they try to destroy the Empire's second Death Star and Luke attempts to turn his father, Darth Vader, back to the good side. The film was directed by Richard Marquand and starred Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, and Carrie Fisher. It made over $374 million worldwide and was praised for its acting, music, special effects, and action scenes.
title: Return of the Jedi
